CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In terms of the π-π stacking distance ( d π ) , a significantly shorter distance ( 3.7 Å ) was observed.

Let's think step by step.

1. The first entity is "π-π stacking distance (d π)". Here, "π-π stacking distance" is the material property or characteristic being referred to, and "(d π)" is a sub-entity representing the symbolic notation for the distance. So, the Material Name entities in this paragraph are "π-π stacking distance" and "d π".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In terms of the π-π stacking distance ( d π ) , a significantly shorter distance ( 3.7 Å ) was observed.

Let's think step by step.

1. π-π stacking distance (d π)

The entities identified in the paragraph are:

1. π-π stacking distance
2. d π

These entities represent the distance between two aromatic rings stacked on top of each other (π-π interaction).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

The identified entity that clearly refers to a material property is:

1. π-π stacking distance (d π)

This entity represents the material property of the intermolecular distance between two aromatic rings in a π-π stacking arrangement.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| π-π stacking distance (d π) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In terms of the π-π stacking distance ( d π ) , a significantly shorter distance ( 3.7 Å ) was observed.

Let's think step by step.

1. π-π stacking distance (d π)
2. 3.7 Å

In this paragraph, "π-π stacking distance (d π)" and "3.7 Å" are the property values mentioned. The former is a measure of the distance between two aromatic rings stacked on top of each other, while the latter is a specific value of this distance, which is 3.7 Angstroms.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. 3.7 Å (π-π stacking distance)

In this revised version, only the specific value "3.7 Å" is kept as it is the only entity that directly refers to a material property value. The "π-π stacking distance" is a descriptor that helps to understand the context of the value, but it is not a value itself.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 3.7 Å (π-π stacking distance) |

This table presents the property value "3.7 Å (π-π stacking distance)" as requested. The property name "π-π stacking distance" is not included in the table since it is not a value itself, but rather a descriptor that helps to understand the context of the value.
